name: The Last One?
description:
This is not a boss. This is the boss of the bosses. The One who knows about everything you have done.

You are now on the edge between your true human nature and your gaming interests. Will you listen to the entity who deprived you of everything you had in previous games? I know, it will not stop you. Nothing will.

Including:

  • A procedurally-generated invincible boss who knows everything about you. Even about your deaths in this game
  • AI voice actor who doubts any use in your existence
  • Truly sterile world created by the One
  • A faceless default protagonists. Because all of us are default
  • Questions about your true human nature
  • Thirty hours of VFX guides wasted for ten effects
  • Beautiful main theme by my future friend Johann Sebastian Bach
  • SFX from hell (free sound assets sites)
  • WorstMost Beautiful. UI. Ever.

Minimal requirements:

  • Windows 10 x64 (or Windows 11 x64)
  • GTX 1050 or its analogs

E to interact with the cube, WASD and a mouse is everything you need. He knows you. Knows your name. Knows your past. Face him!
